flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3200>>3200 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3200-1200=<<3200-1200=2010>>2010 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 2010. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
